# CA360º Portal Release Evidence Pack Template

**Release Version:** vX.Y.Z  
**Release Date:** YYYY-MM-DD  
**Release Type:** RC | RELEASED  
**Generated By:** CI Workflow

## Purpose

This evidence pack provides defensible proof that the CA360º portal meets all release criteria. It is generated automatically at each RC cut and must accompany all RELEASED versions.

## 10. Release Criteria Checklist

- [ ] All 6 PR-blocking gates pass
- [ ] Zero UniqueKey collisions (or approved exceptions)
- [ ] Exceptions.yml empty or valid (future expiry + approvals)
- [ ] Portal entrypoints index complete (14 AoRs, 4 navigation patterns)
- [ ] STK_CEGT operational (4 registries + KPI + ESG indices)
- [ ] All SSOT registry packs present for all AoRs
- [ ] Link integrity check passes
- [ ] Contract file manifest generated
- [ ] Stakeholder approvals obtained (for RELEASED)
- [ ] Delta summary documented
